list.description:
Sight with P90 from Girls Frontline.
It was made in the TurboWarp browser program.

INSTALLATION INSTRUCTION:
1. Download the Zip-file and unzip it.
2. Go to the root folder of the game, find the folder Usersights and paste the unzipped file into the folder All Tanks.
3. Launch the game. Enter Options > Common Battle Settings > Use alternative sight grid and choose P90_love. Repeat 3rd step choosing all tanks one by one in hangar to set the sight to every tank.
4. Enjoy!

If the Usersights folder is not displayed in the root folder of the game, then follow the third step from the ins...

Universal Rebecca sight

For @SLADKIY-Mafin

#universal_sight #universal #sight #cyberpunkedgerunners #rebecca

Fictional sight for the VT1-2 that takes into account that the second gun is offset, you can rangefind and aim easier.

Made for DM23 but works for DM13, not for DM12

Credits to Jordanjsg for original sight.

#vt12 #vt1_2 #fictional #versuchsträger_1_2 #versuchsträger #dm23 #dm13 #simple

Simple sight for xm800t

Vertical range indicators are for 500m, 1000m, 1500m, 2000m.
Dispersion and penetration make shots beyond 2000m very unlikely to be effective.

Space between hashmarks are 1 milrad each for stadiametric rangefinding if necessary.
[divide dimensions of target (roughly 3m width or 6m length for a typical tank) by number of milrads to yield approx distance in km(e.g. a tank viewed from the front that is 5 milrad wide is 3/5=0.6 km away)]

Velocity of top belt displayed when zoomed out, I find this can be helpful when leading aircraft.

Default color is green, li...
